casebody.data:
Theodore F. BOVICH, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 11620. Circuit Court of Appeals, Ninth Circuit. Oct. 15, 1947. Albert Michelson, of San Francisco, Cal. (Herbert Chamberlin, of San Francisco, Cal., of counsel), for appellant. Frank J. Hennessy, U. S. Atty., John H. Black, Edw. R. Kay, Henry W. Schaldach, and J. Hampton Hoge, all of San Francisco, Cal., for appellee.

Before MATHEWS, HEALY, and BONE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

On the grounds and for the reasons stated in its opinion, 70 F.Supp. 482, the decree of the District Court is affirmed.
